name: wor6le
description:
6 guesses. 5 letters. 1 streak.

Ripping off Inspired by the hit game wordle, I made this game in 24 hours to challenge myself, both in making the game and playing it. Is regular wordle just too easy for you? You watched a 3Blue1Brown video and now the challenge is gone? wor6le is guaranteed to kick your ass (maybe). No cheating please and thank.

INSTRUCTIONS

Type words in or use on screen keyboard and press enter to submit a guess. If it is a valid word, each letter will change colour.
GREY = Not in the solution
YELLOW = In the solution but wrong spot
GREEN = Correct spot

Touchscreen should be supported but is only really usable on a tablet at the moment.

If you enjoy this little game, check out my other project Aventia, a deckbuilding game with a story based campaign and a roguelike gauntlet.
